Uses of Class
exception.InvalidInputException

  • Packages that use InvalidInputException 
    Package Description
    client.remoteController
    Contains the classes used to send messages to the server
    commons
    Contains all different classes that are common between server and client
    controller
    Contains all the different controllers, the main logic of the game is here
    server.RMIHandler
    Contains all the classes to manage the RMI connections

    • Uses of InvalidInputException in server.RMIHandler

      Methods in server.RMIHandler that throw InvalidInputException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      InterfaceServerControllerRMI ConnectionHandler.askForConnection​(InterfaceClientControllerRMI clientController, java.lang.String nickname)
      this method is very similar to the register method in ServerControllerRMI, basically is the method that a client has to call to make a connection with the server
      void ServerControllerRMI.grabAmmoCard​(int xDestination, int yDestination, int clientHashedID)
      This method is called by a client when a player wants to grab an ammo card from a specific location
      void ServerControllerRMI.grabWeapon​(int xDestination, int yDestination, int indexOfWeapon, int clientHashedID, int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
      This method is called by a client when he wants to grab a weapon froma specific location
      void ServerControllerRMI.makeAction1Frenzy​(int posX, int posY, ShootingParametersClient input, int clientHashedID)
      This method is used by a player when he wants to perform a franzy action.
      void ServerControllerRMI.makeAction1FrenzyLower​(int posX, int posY, ShootingParametersClient input, int clientHashedID)
      This method is used to make the action Shoot but with 2 moves (action1 frenzy allows to make 1 move)
      void ServerControllerRMI.move​(int iDestination, int jDestination, int clientHashedID)
      This method is called when a player wants to make a move in the game It delegates to matchController the actual move
      void ServerControllerRMI.shoot​(ShootingParametersClient input, int clientHashedID)
      This method is used whenever a user wants to make the shoot action in the game
      void ServerControllerRMI.useNewton​(int indexOfPowerUp, java.lang.String affectedPlayer, int xDest, int yDest, int clientHashedID)
      useNewton is called when a newton powerUp has to be used
      void ServerControllerRMI.useTeleporter​(int indexOfPowerUp, int xDest, int yDest, int clientHashedID)
      useTeleporter is called when a teleporter powerUp has to be used
